Articles.Content: Hi there. I've done seperate installs for mods in the past, and it worked fine. Today, I attempted to use the launcher in the game files (as opposed to Steam) to launch KSP. I was greeted with this. Is this some new 0.24 DRM, or did I just mess something up? My KSP was heavily modded, but I wiped the Gamedata folder (I kept Squad and NASA of course) and the problem persists. Any help would be appreciated!
I had that happen a couple of weeks ago so I just used the KSP .exe shortcut instead for a while. No idea why it did it but the problem resolved itself and the launcher works now.
